title: How to farm with Anivia?
body:
So i bought Anivia and I've been doing really well with her. There's one problem, this champion is absolute SHIT at farming. Her auto projectiles are slow as fuck, her auto attack animation is slow as fuck and if you use her R to farm you'll have no mana in about 7 seconds.

HELP

replies.body: Practice...that's it. There's no special strategy.

learn the auto animation im level 7 anivia and when i first started her the AA was bad and it was hard but now i can get around 80 farm at 10min and you dont really run out of mana after tear and rod.

Okay, thanks!

also remember that her Q has 2 spell prokes so let the first proke hit then pop the Q so you can clear a whole wave in 2 Qs

> also remember that her Q has 2 spell prokes so let the first proke hit then pop the Q so you can clear a whole wave in 2 Qs
 
I didn't know that, thank you.

...You cant farm with anivia, who has about the best waveclear of any mage in the game....?   
._.

Press Q. Press Q again. Stop building DFG as a first item (or whatever you are doing), so you actually have mana.
